name: C'era una volta a Mondstadt
desc: Diluc's specialty. Feast your eyes and then your stomach upon this delicacy as the soft ribs melt in your mouth. Who knew Diluc was able to cook this well?

value.text: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 20% and CRIT DMG by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s)

customize.name: Ricetta: Stratosferico del Ludi
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making "Pile 'Em Up."

customize.name: Pezzo di carne cruda
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Patata
customize.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

customize.name: Lampadulina
customize.desc: A wild grass that emits light at night. Used in cooking to enhance other flavors.

customize.name: Formaggio
customize.desc: A base di latte fermentato. Ad alto contenuto energetico e usato in una vasta gamma di piatti.

customize.name: Stratosferico del Ludi
customize.desc: A rich, meaty dish. Originally a Mondstadt dish made of steaks, potatoes and cheese, it has since become synonymous with Ludi Harpastum.

customize.name: Diluc
customize.desc: Il magnate di un impero vinicolo a Mondstadt, la sua ricchezza, reputazione e le sue capacit√† sono senza eguali.
